text:
Hi there - I'm new here and am struggling with what may be a daft question, grateful for any help.

I'm trying to work out how to use the value of a logged-in user's contact property in the CRM in the js part of a custom module.

This is a data series for a chart (with arbitrary data):

series: [{
name: 'sales',
data: [30,40,45,50,49,60,70,91,125]
}],


How can I replace a static data value with, for example, the value of:

{{ contact.tenancy_created_company }} ? I'm assuming I need to 'set' this value in the HTML/Hubl but I'm struggling to get anywhere.

I'd be really grateful for any help! Many thanks.
